mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.name, c.semester, c.course_time as courseTime, cl.name as classroomName, c.max_students as maxStudents, c.current_students as currentStudents, c.credit FROM course c JOIN teacher t ON c.teacher_id = t.id LEFT JOIN classroom cl ON c.classroom_id = cl.id WHERE t.user_id = #{teacherId}
SELECT t.id, t.name, t.title, t.user_id as userId, u.username FROM teacher t LEFT JOIN user u ON t.user_id = u.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO teacher (name, title, user_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{title}, #{userId})
